name: Rubby
description:
Explore, fight and solve puzzle that's what you will do in Rubby. Go head first in this third person action-adventure game. made for the open GameArt GameJam.

Control Rubby on the quest to save its creator! Uncover the story with collectibles and enjoy the journey!

Don't forget your slime and think it's gonna be slippery

Control 
W-A-S-D or Arow  move around
Mouse control  Camera
Hold Right click Aiming
Left Click Shoot

The game was made for the OpenGame Art GameJam with a team of fourth friends. We have one mounth to deliver a awsome game and use OpenGame Art Asset.

CREDITS

Game Designer and Lead Programing- Kevin Fournier

Level Designer and Level Art - Farkas-Antoine (Level Outside) and Lucas St-Georges (Level Inside)

UI Designer and Sound designer- Xavier Binette
